code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with severe cough, severe fever, severe shortness of breath and Respiratory. she is a white F watchmaker aged 33 ys. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 93.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 18, CT Chest demonstrates areas of centriacinar emphysema, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, actively coughing with sputum production - dark yellow, Neck = no JVD a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:administered salmeterol - 50 mcg (inhaled) 2xday, performed CT Chest, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

content2.Unmatched: sputum production - dark yellow , Neck = no JVD

td.content: s:a 33 yo white female watchmaker c/o 10 days h/o severe cough, severe fever and severe shortness of breath. NKDA. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 92.3 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, actively coughing with sputum production - dark yellow, Neck = no JVD a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

content2.Unmatched: sputum production - dark yellow , Neck = no JVD

td.content: s:33 year old female presents w/ c/o 5 weeks h/o severe cough, severe shortness of breath, severe fever and Respiratory. Denies ever using tobacco denies any alcohol use o:Height 167 cm, Weight 94 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, actively coughing with sputum production - dark yellow, Neck = no JVD a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Prednisone - 20 mg orally, and ordered Noninvasive positive-pressure ventilation - Lungs.

sputum production - dark yellow , Neck = no JVD
